description: Updates the details for the specified Amazon Chime SDK Voice Connector.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the Voice Connector.

parameters.name: RequireEncryption
parameters.description: When enabled, requires encryption for the Voice Connector.

nested_items.name: AwsRegion
nested_items.description: The AWS Region in which the Voice Connector is created. Default: us-east-1.

nested_items.name: OutboundHostName
nested_items.description: The outbound host name for the Voice Connector.

nested_items.name: RequireEncryption
nested_items.description: Enables or disables encryption for the Voice Connector.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Voice Connector's creation timestamp, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Voice Connector's updated timestamp, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: VoiceConnectorArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Voice Connector.

nested_items.name: IntegrationType
nested_items.description: The connectors for use with Amazon Connect.
